txt.en: 'I will prepare the men!'
Defeated all of the attacking Khundolar
<rgb=#FF0000>Céola was defeated</rgb>
The Khundolar prepare to lay siege to Etheburg, and you have chosen to defend the way-post.
'To arms!'
'I will rain arrows upon our enemies!'
'For Théoden!'
Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should speak at once with Céola to learn his plan.
'I will rain arrows upon our enemies!'
Defeat all of the attacking Khundolar.
Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should speak with Céola regarding the battle at Etheburg.
'I will rain arrows upon our enemies!'
'I will rain arrows upon our enemies!'

'[placeholder], I am glad that you have chosen to stand with us! Twiga will lead the forces in the upper tier of Etheburg, while you, our men, and I defend the lower tiers.

'If you so desire, you may enter the watch-towers and speak with the archers on duty. If you do, they will rain arrows down upon our foes.

'Now, to arms!'
Talk to Céola
'Withdraw!'
'You have acquitted yourself well, [placeholder], and have most definitely earned this reward. May our arms remain strong!'
Defeat all of the attacking Khundolar
Talk to Céola at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
'We shall speak again later, [placeholder].'
<rgb=#00FFFF>If you possess Bagmund's Medallion, you may use it now in this place to grant yourself a buff.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Céola must not be defeated</rgb>
Instance: Lights in the Land
